title: Inheritage Cultural Heritage Dataset (India)
subtitle: Open dataset of Indian & GLobal Indic Heritage Sites, temples, and monuments with architecture, cultural, geospatial, media, and AI metadata.
description: This dataset is maintained by the Inheritage Foundation and mirrors the public API suite (v1.0). It includes denormalised records for 7,000+ Indian heritage sites, geospatial features (GeoJSON), media bundles (images, tours, CAD), citation metadata, platform headers (rate limits, caching), and AI-ready narratives/embeddings. All data is published under CC BY 4.0 with mandatory visible attribution. Developers can access the live API at https://inheritage.foundation/api/v1 and the TypeScript SDK at https://www.npmjs.com/package/@inheritage-foundation/sdk.
